overview: SPRING BREAK! 200,000 college students head for the coast to relax and party during their break from classes and they turn this stretch of beach into a 24 hour party zone. Vince (VINCE VAN PATTEN) and his Girlfriend Chris (RENEE NORTON) are all set to enjoy a week together but Vince's roommates  have a totally different idea!
title: The Ultimate Spring Break
